The National Police, the State Emergency Service and the National Guard will be engaged in the preparation of consolidated units.

About thisstatedMinister of Internal Affairs of Ukraine Igor Klimenko during a working trip to Kharkiv on March 23.

"These consolidated detachments should be ready for prompt departure to another region that will need help," Igor Klimenko stressed.

He reported that Kharkiv's mobile cuisine of the SES. It can provide three meals a day for 200 people and unfolds during mass search and rescue operations.

"We will work to ensure that such transport in Ukraine becomes more," - said Igor Klimenko.
